merchant.title: Merchant Account Verification
merchant.description: Submit your documents to verify your merchant account
merchant.formDescription: To activate your merchant account, please upload the following documents for verification

idCard.label: ID Card
idCard.description: Valid identity card, passport, or driver's license

businessLicense.label: Business License
businessLicense.description: Official document authorizing your commercial activity

taxCertificate.label: Tax Certificate
taxCertificate.description: Up-to-date tax certificate or VAT number

proofOfAddress.label: Proof of Address
proofOfAddress.description: Recent utility bill (water, electricity, phone) less than 3 months old
